page.title: 19A Final Look
page.content: Through the work we have done in the {Domesday Survey}we have learnt a lot about our{local area.}We have found that it is mainly a{farming area}and we now realise how hard{farmers}work. We have also seen how important {Wentworth Woodhouse}has been to the area. Parts of the area are now changing as lots of{new houses}are built but we think that it will still be mainly a{farming area}for a long time.{Wentworth}village is very unusual because it is an{estate {village and}no new building has been allowed. It is a very pretty village and lots of visitors come to see it. We think{tourism}could become important in the area. In{1986 the {Polytechnic}will{stop}using{Wentworth {House}and no one is sure what will happen to it. We hope it will{open}to} the{public.
